thread.title: Close to Times Square
thread.title_full: Close to Times Square - Review of Hyatt Place New York Midtown South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Laura M
title: Close to Times Square
text: I went to NY for a holiday weekend and stayed in this hotel. I really liked that has a great location close to the subway, and a few blocks from Times Square. I found a good deal online so I think it was worth the price. The building is quite, breakfast is good, the staff is friendly, the WiFi works perfectly (I've stayed in good hotels with poor WiFi)
